name: Sonic's new and improved schoolhouse
description:
Install instructions

Step 1: Download the .zip or .rar version

Step 2 (rar version): Download WinRAR if you haven't already

Step 3 (rar version): Double click the executable and enjoy

Step 2 (zip version): Extract the package thing (if you have WinRAR then this step is optional)

Step 3 (zip version): Double click the executable enjoy
